description: Try our easy to follow Granny's Lemon Delicious recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lemon pie & tart,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Granny's Lemon Delicious Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 lemons, juiced and rind finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a 4-cup ovenproof dish and place onto a baking tray. Separate 2 of the eggs, placing egg yolks into a saucepan and whites into a clean bowl. Add remaining egg (yolk and white), 1/2 cup of the sugar, lemon rind and juice and 1 cup boiling water to saucepan with egg yolks. Whisk well until combined.
Mix cornflour and 1/2 cup cold water in a small bowl until smooth. Add to saucepan. Stir over medium heat until mixture boils and thickens. Pour into dish and leave to cool.
Meanwhile, beat egg whites with remaining sugar until thick and glossy. Dollop over pudding and swirl roughly. Using a kitchen blow torch, brown the meringue until golden (see tip). Serve warm.
